Producer: Lyn Sisson-Talbert, Kristin Burr, Mike Jackson, John Legend, David McIlvain, David E. Talbert
Production Co: Golden Girl, 260 Degrees Entertainment, Get Lifted Film Co., Brillstein Entertainment Partners
Synopsis: Decades after his apprentice betrays him, a once joyful toymaker finds new hope when his bright young granddaughter appears on his doorstep.
Title: Jingle Jangle: A Christmas Journey
